options.text: 30–60p agencies lose 10% productivity due to manual task tracking in Trello
options.why: Automates tracking, freeing up creative time

options.text: Remote teams face 25% communication drop-off in Slack during high-stakes projects
options.why: Improves team alignment, reducing project risks

options.text: 10–50p teams struggle with version control in Adobe XD, causing 15% project delays
options.why: Ensures timely delivery by managing files efficiently
